LinesAnswers.name: initial
LinesAnswers.line: The spirits of the forest and of the earth will pass our days! You are a young sprout, do you want something from me, an old stump already aged? Un-daaa, un-daaa, thank the spirits!

responses.response: No, grandpa, you should take some pills.
Wow, is that magic? What was it like? Sim-salabim, ahalai-mahalai...
Mother earth, native rivers! Help me grandfather with the stray men!

LinesAnswers.name: initialNoMeMomAsk
LinesAnswers.line: The spirits of the forest and of the earth will pass our days! You are a young sprout, do you want something from me, an old stump already aged? Un-daaa, un-daaa, thank the spirits!

responses.response: No, grandpa, you should take some pills.
Wow, is that magic? What was it like? Sim-salabim, ahalai-mahalai...

LinesAnswers.name: initialFailed
LinesAnswers.line: Walk through the woods young sprout, the sun is shining in the east!

LinesAnswers.name: initialSuccess
LinesAnswers.line: I see your thoughts, but is evil or good behind you? Parampas, parampas...

responses.response: Can I go out for a breath? There is a smoke of incomprehensible herbs in here...
Eh, now I'll teach those miners and go to sleep, what more do I need.
We need to curb those unbridled energies so that there will be grace in the carriage!

LinesAnswers.name: 2ndFailed
LinesAnswers.line: I don't believe you, boy, go gather cones in the taiga!

LinesAnswers.name: 2ndSuccess
LinesAnswers.line: I see your soul is almost pure, get a potion from your forefathers!

LinesAnswers.name: shamanNirvana
LinesAnswers.line: SIMON: Grandfather talks to the forefathers, don't wake up trouble while it's still quiet.
